SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am32
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am32.model.field

Class Field

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am32.model.field.Field
public class Field extends Object
Used to store information about the field of the player. It contains the cards placed and the resources available.

  • Field Summary

    The number of resources in the game

  • Constructor Details

    • Field

      public Field(NonObjectiveCard initialCard, boolean isUp)
      Initialize the field, put resources counter to 0 and insert the initial card
      Parameters:
      initialCard - id the card that was assigned
      isUp - denote the side of the card chosen by the player

  • Method Details

    • placeCardInField

      public void placeCardInField(NonObjectiveCard nonObjectiveCard, int x, int y, boolean isUp) throws InvalidPositionException, MissingRequirementsException
      Verifies if it's possible to place the card in the field. If it is, place the card and update the available resources in the field
      Parameters:
      nonObjectiveCard - is the card to be placed
      x - is the horizontal coordinate of the position
      y - is the vertical coordinate of the position
      isUp - is the side of the card
      Throws:
      InvalidPositionException - if the position is not valid
      MissingRequirementsException - if the resources are not enough

    • getCardFromPosition

      public NonObjectiveCard getCardFromPosition(int x, int y)
      Returns the card at the given position if available.
      Parameters:
      x - X position of the card in the field to return
      y - Y position of the card in the field to return
      Returns:
      NonObjectiveCard at given coordinates if present in the field, else null.

    • availableSpace

      public boolean availableSpace(int x, int y)
      Verify whether a card can be freely placed at the given coordinates
      Parameters:
      x - is the coordinate on the horizontal axis for the space searched
      y - is the coordinate on the vertical axis for the space searched
      Returns:
      true if the space is available, false if not

    • resourceCornersConverter

      protected static int[] resourceCornersConverter(CornerType first, CornerType second, CornerType third, CornerType forth)
      Converts the given corners to an array of integers (of size 7) containing the number of occurrences of the 7 resources in the card corners. the array is order following the convention used for ObjectType
      Parameters:
      first - is the specific corner of the card
      second - is the specific corner of the card
      third - is the specific corner of the card
      forth - is the specific corner of the card
      Returns:
      the array of integer

    • checkResRequirements

      protected static boolean checkResRequirements(int[] resources, int[] requirements)
      Given the two arrays check if the values of the first array are greater or equal then those of the second array in the same index for every position of the second array
      Parameters:
      resources - is the array that contain the current resources
      requirements - is the array of the requirements for the resources
      Returns:
      true if the check result is positive, false if the length of the second array is grater than that of the first array or if the checking process resulted negatively

    • resourcesObtained

      protected static int[] resourcesObtained(NonObjectiveCard nonObjectiveCard, boolean isUp)
      Given the card and the side, return an array of integer where at each position (according to the attribute value of the enumeration ObjectType) is inserted the number of resources gained if the card is placed
      Parameters:
      nonObjectiveCard - is the card that has to be placed
      isUp - is the side, of the card, relevant to the play
      Returns:
      the array of integer

    • rollback

      public NonObjectiveCard rollback() throws RollbackException
      This method is used to roll back the last operation performed on the field. It removes the last card placed in the field and restores the resources to their previous state.
      Returns:
      The NonObjectiveCard that was removed from the field.
      Throws:
      RollbackException - if the field is empty or if there is only the starting card in the field.

    • getFieldCards

      public ArrayList<CardPlaced> getFieldCards()
      Getter
      Returns:
      the structure containing the all the placed cards

    • getActiveRes

      public int getActiveRes(ObjectType type)
      Getter
      Parameters:
      type - is the nature of the resource requested
      Returns:
      the amount of occurrences in the field of the specified resource

    • getAllRes

      public int[] getAllRes()
      Getter
      Returns:
      the array containing the amount of each resource of the field
